sections: We'd love to see a Motorious reader win this Stingray!

is the holy grail of the third-generation of Corvette. The legendary LS6 Corvette Stingray is a king amongst the car collectors and it received the National Corvette Restorers' Society Top Flight Award, The engine was also verified as original by a leading expert of Chevy Corvette big block engines.

Stealing the whole show, the engine has 454 cubic inches of brute and makes 425-horsepower - aka a whole lot for 1971! In addition to the engine, the options this particular Corvette came with make it even more valuable.
come around very often, and when they do, it's time to pounce.

anyone with as little as three bucks a chance to own this fully-restored 1971 Corvette Stingray LS6 Chevy Big Block. In addition to winning the car, they'll also pay $42,000 to cover taxes for the winner.
